person.persName: John McAllister Schofield (West Point, New York, major general)

body.p: West Point, New York, soldier and instructor. New York native. Married to Harriet B. Schofield. Father of John R. Schofield, William B. Schofield, and Mary C. Schofield. Graduate of the United States Military Academy in West Point in 1853. Cadet at United States Military Academy in 1850. Served in the United States Army as a first lieutenant from 1853 to 1860. Resident in West Point in 1860. Instructor at Washington University in St. Louis, Missouri in 1861. Served in the United States Army as a major, brigadier general, major general, and lieutenant general from 1861 to 1895.
